name: com.unity.graphtools.foundation
description: A framework for node based tools including a graph data model, a UI foundation and graph-to-asset pipeline. Use this package to speed up the development of graph based tools for the Unity Editor that adhere to Unity UI and UX guidelines.

samples.description: A simple example from a graph editor made with Graph Foundation Tools
A simple example from a graph editor made with Graph Foundation Tools
A simple example of usage of vertical flow using Graph Tools Foundation
A simple example of usage of contexts using Graph Tools Foundation
